snippet: Officials said they were investigating how security measures at a base in Provence were defeated and whether there are problems at other bases.
abstract: French Defense Ministry reports theft of explosives from military base in south of France, despite heightened security following June terrorist attack on an American-owned chemical plant in Lyon; ministry says stolen explosives and detonators can be used to make a bomb.
lead_paragraph: Officials said they were investigating how security measures at a base in Provence were defeated and whether there are problems at other bases.

headline.main: Thieves Grab Bomb Parts at French Military Base
headline.print_headline: Bomb Parts Were Stolen at French Base
